TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23VHGTEST_MIMIRselect the_date, active,nvl(r.group_ssn,ssn) ssn_rank,sum(nvl(r.netexposure,0)) group_net_exposure, sum(nvl(r.credit_risk_exposure,0)) group_credit_risk_exposure, dense_rank() over ( partition by the_date order by sum(nvl(r.credit_risk_exposure,0)) desc) rank_group from reports r where report_id=423 and active='Y' and r.ssn = 0904582729 group by the_date,active,nvl(r.group_ssn,ssn)
